mapper.select:
select * from sckj_user_list as user
and UPPER(user.user_type) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER (#{userType}),'%')
and UPPER(user.user_Id) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER (#{userId}),'%')
and UPPER(user.Tel) LIKE CONCAT('%',UPPER (#{tel}),'%')
ORDER BY user.regtime DESC
